  • Exports
  Source   Edit

Commonly used exceptions definitions. More target-specific errors are implemented in respective submodules such as [[code:hshell.ShellError]] for shell-related operations, [[code:oswrap.PathError]] for unexpected situations related to filesystem path handling and [[code:oswrap.EnvVarError]] for environment variable handling.

Imports

msgbuilder

Types

ArgumentError = object of CatchableError
Invalid argument passed to a functions   Source   Edit 
CodeError = ref object of CatchableError
  raisepos*: LineInfo
  case fromString*: bool
  of true:
      substr*: GlobalSubstring
      offset*: int

  of false:
      errpos*: LineInfo      ## Position of original error
    
  annots*: seq[ErrorAnnotation] ## Additional error annotations
  postannot*: string
  Source   Edit 
EnvironmentAssertionError = object of ArgumentError
  Source   Edit 
ErrorAnnotation = object
  case fromString*: bool
  of true:
      offset*: int           ## Offset from the start of main substring
    
  of false:
      errpos*: LineInfo

  expr*: string
  annotation*: string
  linerange*: int
  Source   Edit 
GetterError = object of ArgumentError
  Source   Edit 
GlobalSubstring = object
  str*: string               ## Substring slice
  line*: int                 ## Line number for substring in main file
  column*: int               ## Column number for substring in file
  filename*: string          ## Name of the file being parsed
Part of main string (from file or user input)   Source   Edit

  Source   Edit 
ImplementError = object of CatchableError
I use this error as a more active restrictive TODO tag.   Source   Edit
